original_text: The Jews who were in Susa gathered also on the fourteenth day of the month of Adar and they killed 300 men in Susa, but they laid no hands on the plunder.
korean_text: 아달월 십사일에도 수산에 있는 유다인이 모여 또 삼백 명을 수산에서 도륙하되 그들의 재산에는 손을 대지 아니하였고

sentences.original_text: The Jews who were in Susa
gathered also on the fourteenth day of the month of Adar
and they killed 300 men in Susa
but they laid no hands on the plunder.
